description: Serstech AB engages in the provision of solutions for chemical identifications in the safety and security industry. The company is headquartered in Lund, Skane and currently employs 13 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2013-08-29. The firm's products split light into various wavelengths to identify drugs, and explosive and hazardous materials. The firm offers micro-spectrometer chips, which are optical components integrated on chips for the measurement of color, absorption, fluorescence, and Raman spectra; micro-spectrometer-boards; surface enhanced Raman spectroscopy surfaces that provide various orders of magnitude amplification in independent tests; and custom spectrometers. The firm offers its products for security, defense, industry, med-tech, and clean-tech application areas. The company serves customers such as police, rescue, customs, and defense officers to identify powders, pills, and fluids.
naics: Navigational, Measuring, Electromedical, and Control Instruments Manufacturing
naicsNationalIndustry: Other Measuring and Controlling Device Manufacturing
name: Serstech AB
